roleset.name: bring shame upon
roleset.note: DISHONOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dishonor' based on sentences in brown. (from dishonor.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: He finished the worship service as if there had been no brazen attempt [0] [*]to dishonor God and man [*T*-1] .

example.name: passive
example.text: The men of your company would not allow [your name]-1 dishonored [*-1].
